name: Create new MailChimp subscribers from Interact quiz submissions
description:
Every time a new Interact quiz with lead data is submitted, a new subscriber will be added to your MailChimp list.

The template expects your Interact quiz to have these fields:
1) First Name
2) Last Name
3) Email

The template also expects your MailChimp list to have these fields:
1) First Name
2) Last Name
